data.comment: In the minute -1, 3000 spectators have come along to Arsenal Stadium today.
Vitaly Meshkov starts the match. Arsenal Tula with the kick-off in Tula.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
Evans Kangwa (Arsenal Tula) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Rostov in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Rostov have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Rostov surge into the attack at Arsenal Stadium but Maksim Osipenkoâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 4, Arsenal Tula have a goal kick.
Arsenal Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tula.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Rostov's half.
Throw-in for Rostov at Arsenal Stadium.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Rostov in their own half.
Ball safe as Arsenal Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Tula a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 8, Rostov to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
Can Rostov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
Evans Kangwa puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 9, Sergey Tkachyov with an assist there.
Vitaly Meshkov awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Rostov.
In the minute 10, Vitaly Meshkov signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Rostov's half.
Throw-in Rostov.
Can Rostov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
In the minute 13, Throw-in high up the field for Rostov in Tula.
Evgeni Chernov gets an equalizer for Rostov. The score is now 1-1.
Alexey Ionov instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 14, Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Rostov.
In the minute 15, Vitaly Meshkov awards Rostov a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a throw-in for Rostov, close to Arsenal Tula's area.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Alexey Ionov for Rostov has been booked by Vitaly Meshkov and receives a first yellow card.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Rostov's half.
In the minute 19, Rostov's Danil Glebov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Arsenal Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
Free kick Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal Tula goal kick.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Rostov.
Rostov to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
In the minute 22, Can Rostov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
In the minute 24, Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula.
Evgeni Chernov (Rostov) has received a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 26, Arsenal Tula's Taras Burlak is whistled for offside at Arsenal Stadium.
Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Rostov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Arsenal Tula in the half of Rostov.
Vitaly Meshkov awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Free kick Rostov.
Alexey Ionov for Rostov drives towards goal at Arsenal Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Rostov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
In the minute 32, Rostov's Danil Glebov is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Rostov in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Rostov have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
Yuri Kovalev (Arsenal Tula) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
Goal kick for Arsenal Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
Ball safe as Rostov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, Arsenal Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Rostov in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Kings Kangwa (Arsenal Tula) has received a yellow card from Vitaly Meshkov.
In the minute 39, Rostov pushes forward through Danil Glebov, whose finish on goal is saved.
Vitaly Meshkov awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal! Rostov have taken a 1-2 lead courtesy of a header from Kento Hashimoto.
In the minute 40, Great play from Denis Hadzikadunic to set up the goal.
Throw-in Arsenal Tula.
Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a Rostov throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Rostov.
The first-half has ended.
Great finish from Kento Hashimoto to give Rostov a 1-3 lead.
In the minute 46, Rostov kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 46, Arsenal Tula's Evans Kangwa has run offside.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Kirill Kombarov is on a sub for Artem Sokol for Arsenal Tula.
Valeri Karpin (Rostov) is making a first substitution, with Dmitri Chistyakov replacing Denis Hadzikadunic.
Arsenal Tula make their second substitution with Abdul Mohammed replacing Kings Kangwa.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Robert Bauer (Arsenal Tula) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
In the minute 48, Vitaly Meshkov awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Khoren Bayramyan is booked for the away team.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Rostov.
In the minute 49, Vitaly Meshkov signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Rostov's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tula.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
In the minute 51, Arsenal Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 52, Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rostov's half?
Rostov's Mathias Normann has been booked in Tula.
Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
In the minute 53, Ball safe as Rostov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
At Arsenal Stadium, Kento Hashimoto has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula.
Danil Glebov (Rostov) has received a yellow card from Vitaly Meshkov.
In the minute 55, Sergey Tkachyov of Arsenal Tula smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Arsenal Tula drive upfield and Kirill Kombarov gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Rostov defender.
Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, Throw-in Arsenal Tula.
Rostov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
In the minute 59, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Rostov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 60, Khoren Bayramyan of Rostov gets in a strike, but is off target.
Arsenal Tula have a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Arsenal Tula's Kirill Kombarov has been booked in Tula.
Throw-in for Rostov in their own half.
Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rostov's half?
In the minute 61, Vitaly Meshkov awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Dmitri Poloz is replacing Alexey Ionov for Rostov at Arsenal Stadium.
In the minute 63, Georgi Kostadinov of Arsenal Tula is pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Arsenal Tula's Georgi Kostadinov gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Rostov defender.
In the minute 64, Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Rostov's half.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Rostov.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Arsenal Tula in the half of Rostov.
Danil Glebov has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rostov's half?
In the minute 68, Arsenal Tula are pushing forward but Robert Bauer's finish is wide of the goal.
Vitaly Meshkov awards Rostov a goal kick.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Rostov.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula close to the penalty box.
Arsenal Tula's Abdul Mohammed breaks free at Arsenal Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Rostov goal kick.
In the minute 70, Valeri Karpin is making the team's third substitution at Arsenal Stadium with Arseni Logashov replacing Eldor Shomurodov.
The home team have replaced Yuri Kovalev with Daniil Khlusevich. This is the third substitution made today by Sergey Podpaliy.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 73, Arsenal Tula's Daniil Khlusevich misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Rostov goal kick.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
In the minute 75, Throw-in Rostov.
Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Arsenal Tula are coming forward and Evans Kangwa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 76, Rostov have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
In the minute 79, Aleksey Kozlov is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Arsenal Tula drives forward and Georgi Kostadinov gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as Arsenal Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 81, The home team replace Igor Gorbatenko with Guram Adzhoev.
Valeri Gromyko is replacing Sergey Tkachyov for the home team.
Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Rostov at Arsenal Stadium.
Vitaly Meshkov awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Rostov.
In the minute 84, Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula just outside Rostov's area.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Rostov's half.
Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rostov's half?
In the minute 86, Arsenal Tula have a dangerous throw-in.
Abdul Mohammed (Arsenal Tula) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Rostov.
In the minute 88, Attention is being given to Rostovâ€™s Mathias Normann and play has been suspended briefly.
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Rostov's half.
Arsenal Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 2-3.
Aleksandr Dolgov is replacing Dmitri Poloz for Rostov at Arsenal Stadium.
Valeri Karpin (Rostov) is making a fifth substitution, with Roman Eremenko replacing Khoren Bayramyan.
Goal! Arsenal Tula reduce the deficit to 2-3 through Abdul Mohammed.
That's a fine assist from Valeri Gromyko.
